Welcome!

I am a research assistant at the Chesapeake Biological Laboratory of the University of Maryland Center for Environmental Science who has lived a brief, former life as an international rugby referee.

When I'm not on the water, my areas of expertise lie in fish movement ecology, biotelemetry, R programming, and spatiotemporal mixed modelling. Please take a look at my [research](https://www.obrien.page/research/), [blog](https://www.obrien.page/blog/), or [software](https://www.obrien.page/research/packages.html) and reach out if you're interestd in working together.

## Current Position

University of Maryland Center for Environmental Science | Faculty Research Assistant | Sept 2013 - present
